title: Side Effects of an Educator: Dr. Monique Morris and Cidra Sebastien
description:
This week we talk to Dr. Monique Morris, president and CEO of Grantmakers for Girls of Color, and Cidra Sebastien, fund manager for Black Girl Freedom Fund, about what it means to center Black girls both with dolla$ and sense.
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/amandaseales)!
